colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @007A *, ,(ZHES LHA BZHI DRIL SGRUB KYI TING NGE 'DZIN GYI DBANG RGYUN DU BLANG BA'I RIM PA BDUD RTZI'I CHAR 'BEBS ZHES BYA BA 'DI NI, RANG CHOS KYI SPUN RDO RJE RGYAL MTSAN GYIS LAG TU BLANG BDE ZHES DGOS ZHES BSKUL BA'I NGOR, LUGS 'DI LA BRTZON PAR BYED PA, SH'AKYA'I BTZUN PA SU MA TI MA nI PRADZNY'AS, SHIN TU GSAL BAR BSGRIGS PA'I YI GE PA NI RNAM DPYOD DANG LDAN PA DGE SLONG SANGG'A BHA DRA'O, ,'DI LA CHAD LHAG GI NONGS PA CI MCHIS PA THAMS CAD BLA MA DANG MGON PO MKHA' 'GRO MA RNAMS KYIS BZOD PAR MDZAD DU GSOL, 'DIS KYANG RGYAL BA'I BSTAN PA DAR ZHING RGYAS LA YUN RING DU GNAS PA DANG, 'GRO RNAMS RGYAL BA RDO RJE 'CHANG GI GO 'PHANG BDE BLAG TU THOB PAR GYUR CIG , ,,DGE'O,, ,,)
